title: Orog
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 10
description | Aggressive | As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
description | Multiattack | The orog makes two greataxe attacks.
description | Greataxe | Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (ldl2 + 4) slashing damage.
description | Javelin | Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft ., one target. Hit: 7 (ld6 + 4) piercing damage.
